TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RichTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows Rich Text Box 控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows rich text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控制項，使用者可以輸入和編輯文字。With the control, the user can enter and edit text. 控制項也會提供更進階的格式化功能，比標準控制項。The control also provides more advanced formatting features than the standard control. 文字可以直接指派給控制項，或可以載入從 rich text 格式 (RTF) 或純文字檔。Text can be assigned directly to the control, or can be loaded from a rich text format (RTF) or plain text file. 字元和段落格式，則可以指派內控制項的文字。The text within the control can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 控制項提供許多可用來將格式套用至文字控制項中的任何部分的屬性。The control provides a number of properties you can use to apply formatting to any portion of text within the control. 若要變更的文字格式，您必須先選擇。To change the formatting of text, it must first be selected. 字元和段落格式，則可以指派只有選取的文字。Only selected text can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 一旦設定，已對選取的文字區段，會選取所有輸入之後進行設定變更之前的選取項目也使用相同的設定格式化的文字或控制項的文件的其他區段。Once a setting has been made to a selected section of text, all text entered after the selection is also formatted with the same settings until a setting change is made or a different section of the control's document is selected. 屬性可讓您將粗體或斜體的文字。The property enables you to make text bold or italic. 您也可以使用這個屬性來變更文字的字體和大小。You can also use this property to change the size and typeface of the text. 屬性可讓您變更文字的色彩。The property enables you to change the color of the text. 若要建立您可以使用的項目符號清單屬性。To create bulleted lists you can use the property. 您也可以調整設定格式化的段落， ，和屬性。You can also adjust paragraph formatting by setting the , , and properties. 控制項提供方法，以開啟和儲存檔案中提供的功能。The control provides methods that provide functionality for opening and saving files. 方法可讓您將現有的 RTF 或 ASCII 文字檔載入至控制項。The method enables you to load an existing RTF or ASCII text file into the control. 您也可以從已開啟的資料流載入資料。You can also load data from an already opened data stream. 可讓您將檔案儲存至 RTF 或 ASCII 文字。The enables you to save a file to RTF or ASCII text. 類似於方法中，您也可以使用儲存到開啟的資料流的方法。Similar to the method, you can also use the method to save to an open data stream. 控制項也提供功能來尋找文字字串。The control also provides features for finding strings of text. 方法是多載，以尋找這兩個文字字串內的控制項文字的 dbms 及特定字元。The method is overloaded to find both strings of text as well as specific characters within the text of the control. 您也可以初始化儲存在記憶體中資料的控制項。You can also initialize the control to data stored in memory. 例如，您可以初始化屬性設為包含的文字顯示，包括 RTF 碼，以決定應如何格式化文字的字串。For example, you can initialize the property to a string that contains the text to display, including the RTF codes that determine how the text should be formatted. 如果控制項內的文字包含連結，例如連結至網站，您可以使用屬性適當地顯示控制項的文字中的連結。If the text within the control contains links, such as a link to a Web site, you can use the property to display the link appropriately in the control's text. 然後您可以處理事件來執行與連結相關聯的工作。You can then handle the event to perform the tasks associated with the link. 屬性可讓您防止使用者操作的控制項內的文字。The property enables you to protect text within the control from manipulation by the user. 您可以使用您在控制項中的受保護文字、 處理事件，以判斷當使用者嘗試修改受保護的文字，並請提醒使用者受保護的文字，或是使用者提供標準的方式來管理受保護的文字。With protected text in your control, you can handle the event to determine when the user has attempted to modify protected text, and either alert the user that the text is protected or provide the user with a standard way to manipulate the protected text. 已使用應用程式控制項可輕鬆地調整以讓使用控制項。Applications that already use controls can easily be adapted to make use of controls. 不過，控制項並沒有相同的 64k 字元容量限制控制項。However, the control does not have the same 64K character capacity limit of the control. 通常用來提供文字操作和顯示功能類似於文書處理應用程式，例如 Microsoft Word。The is typically used to provide text manipulation and display features similar to word processing applications such as Microsoft Word. > [!NOTE] > 方法無法搭配或事件。The method does not work with the or events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立RTF 檔載入的控制項和搜尋的單字"Text"。 第一個執行個體的控制項The following code example creates a control that loads an RTF file into the control and searches for the first instance of the word "Text." 然後程式碼變更字型樣式、 字型大小和選取文字的字型色彩，並將變更儲存回原始的檔案。The code then changes the font style, font size, and font color of the selected text and saves the changes back to the original file. 在範例程式碼完成藉由新增控制項以其。The example code finishes by adding the control to its . 這個範例需要在此範例程式碼中建立方法會加入至類別，並從表單的建構函式呼叫。This example requires that the method created in the example code is added to a class and called from the constructor of the form. 這個範例也會需要表示已建立作業的 RTF 檔案，根目錄中的 C 磁碟機，包含單字"Text"。The example also requires that an RTF file is created, in the root of the C drive, containing the word "Text." remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，選取任何部分文字控制項中選取整個字。If this property is set to `true`, selecting any part of the text in the control selects the entire word. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立放大文字，會自動選取的控制項文字中單字，word 按兩下，且具有控制項的用戶端區域右邊邊界時。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控制項具有較小的寬度，使用下列程式碼會建立其中每個字元的文字會顯示的那一行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直顯示的位置，文字的任何組件上按一下將選取的文字會垂直顯示的事實不論單字的所有字元。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此範例中，您需要包含表單的表單控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將項目符號樣式套用至文字的段落中，設定屬性，以`true`，然後設定文字應該會縮排的像素數目的屬性。To apply the bullet style to a paragraph of text, set the property to `true` and then set the property to the number of pixels that the text should be indented. 段落會有套用至使用指定的項目符號之後的縮排數量的項目符號樣式。The paragraph will have the bullet style applied to it with the specified amount of indentation after the bullet. 這個屬性只會影響控制項的文字和項目符號項目清單中的目前選取項目符號中目前的段落。This property only affects the current paragraph within the control's text and the currently selected bullet in a list of bulleted items. 若要將不同的縮排層級套用至整個項目符號項目清單中，必須選取的項目符號的項目中的所有文字內容，才能設定屬性。To apply a different indentation level to an entire list of bulleted items, all the text of the bulleted items must be selected before setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用具有屬性， ， ，並屬性，以建立分項清單中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`會在表單上建立。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. summary.span: 判斷是否可以將資訊從剪貼簿貼入指定的資料格式中。

span.span: Determines whether you can paste information from the Clipboard in the specified data format.

span.span: if you can paste data from the Clipboard in the specified data format; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來判斷剪貼簿的目前內容是否在指定的剪貼簿資料格式中，再讓使用者能夠把資訊貼入控制項。You can use this method to determine whether the current contents of the Clipboard are in a specified Clipboard data format before enabling the user to paste the information into the control. 比方說，您可以在其中建立事件處理常式paste 命令的事件並使用這個方法來判斷是否貼上應該根據剪貼簿中的資料類型已啟用。For example, you could create an event handler for a event of a paste command and use this method to determine whether the paste should be enabled based on the type of data in the Clipboard. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來貼上到點陣圖控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 開啟之後點陣圖檔案，此範例會使用方法，將點陣圖複製到 Windows 剪貼簿。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最後，範例會擷取的格式物件，使用方法以驗證格式，可以貼到控制項，然後再使用貼上資料的方法。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, uses the method to verify that the format can be pasted into the control, and then uses the method to paste the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 本版方法會在搜尋中指定的字元清單中字元的第一個執行個體`characterSet`參數並傳回字元的位置。This version of the method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character. 例如，您會傳遞包含字元 'Q' 的字元陣列。For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'. 如果控制項包含文字"The Quick Brown Fox 」，方法會傳回四個值。If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the method would return the value of four. 大寫字元和小寫字元會被視為不同的值，在搜尋。An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search. 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的字元所內找不到控制項的內容。If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control. 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋控制項中的字元群組。You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control. 這個版本的方法需要整份文件，並包含在控制項中，搜尋的字元。This version of the method requires that the entire document contained in the control is searched for the characters. 如果提供的方法中的字元清單中字元`characterSet`找不到參數，這個方法所傳回的值是在控制項中的字元位置的以零為起始索引。If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control. 空格會被視為字元方法所判斷的字元位置時。A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會搜尋的內容的字元傳遞至方法的`text`參數。The following code example searches the contents of a for the characters that are passed to the method in the `text` parameter. 如果內容`text`陣列中找到，此方法會傳回找到，否則為值的索引，則傳回-1。If the contents of the `text` array are found in the , the method returns the index of the value that is found; otherwise, it returns -1. 這個範例需要這個方法會放在類別中的，其中包含控制項，名為`richTextBox1`並控制項，名為`button1`，也就是連線到`Click`中定義的事件處理常式此範例中。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a control named `richTextBox1` and a control, named `button1`, that is connected to the `Click` event handler defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會在搜尋中指定的文字`str`參數並傳回其在控制項內的第一個字元的位置。The method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character within the control. 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的文字字串找不到控制項的內容。If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control. 您可以使用這個方法來建立可供使用者控制項的搜尋功能。You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control. 您也可以使用這個方法來搜尋的文字換成特定格式。You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format. 例如，如果使用者控制項中輸入日期，您可以使用方法來搜尋文件中的所有日期，並以適當的格式取代之前使用控制項的方法。For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you can use the method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the method of the control. 使用此版本的方法中，您可以指定選項，可讓您展開或縮小搜尋範圍。With this version of the method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search. 您可以指定選項，可讓您以符合大小寫的搜尋文字，或搜尋完整文字，而不是部分字組。You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words. 藉由指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`列舉型別中的`options`參數，您可以搜尋文字文件的底部到頂端，而不是預設頂端到底部搜尋方法。By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method. > [!NOTE] > 方法，接受`string`如參數找不到包含在多行文字方塊內文字的文字。The methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the . 執行這類的搜尋，則會傳回負一 (-1)。Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會搜尋的整個內容搜尋字串的第一個執行個體傳遞至方法的文字參數。The following code example searches the entire contents of a for the first instance of a search string passed into the text parameter of the method. 如果搜尋字串中找到，這個方法傳回的值`true`並反白顯示文字; 否則它會傳回`false`。If the search string is found in the , the method returns a value of `true` and highlights the text; otherwise, it returns `false`. 此範例也會指定選項中搜尋符合指定的搜尋字串的大小寫。The example also specifies options in the search to match the case of the specified search string. 這個範例需要這個方法會放在類別中的，其中包含名為`richTextBox1`。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.Find1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.Find1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.Find1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.Find1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.Find1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.Find1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本版方法會在搜尋中指定的字元清單中字元的第一個執行個體`characterSet`參數並傳回字元的位置。This version of the method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character. 例如，您會傳遞包含字元 'Q' 的字元陣列。For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'. 如果控制項包含文字"The Quick Brown Fox 」，方法會傳回四個值。If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the method would return the value of four. 大寫字元和小寫字元會被視為不同的值，在搜尋。An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search. 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的字元所內找不到控制項的內容。If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control. 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋控制項中的字元群組。You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control. 如果提供的方法中的字元清單中字元`characterSet`找不到參數，這個方法所傳回的值是以零起始的字元位置，在控制項中的索引。If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero based index of the character's position in the control. 空格會被視為字元方法所判斷的字元位置時。A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character. 本版方法可讓您搜尋所指定的值，以設定控制項中的文字範圍中，從字元`start`和`end`參數。This version of the method enables you to search for a character set from a range of text in the control by specifying a value for the `start` and `end` parameters. 值為零。`start`參數會指出搜尋應該從控制項的文件的開頭開始。A value of zero for the `start` parameter indicates that the search should start from the beginning of the control's document. 值為-1`end`參數會指出搜尋應該結束時的控制項內的文字。A -1 value for the `end` parameter indicates that the search should end at the end of the text within the control. 您可以使用這個版本的方法，以將搜尋縮小到特定範圍的控制項，以避免搜尋文件並不重要的應用程式需求的區域內的文字。You can use this version of the method to narrow your search to a specific range of text within the control to avoid searching areas of the document that are not important to the needs of your application.

exception.span: 為 null。

span.span: is null.

exception.span: 小於零或大於控制項中文字的長度。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the length of the text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回最接近的位置中指定的字元索引`pt`參數。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字元索引是文字的在控制項中，包含空格的以零為起始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 您可以使用這個方法，以判斷其中文字中的使用者將滑鼠移過將滑鼠座標傳遞給這個方法。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 這可以是很有用，如果您想要在使用者將滑鼠指標停留透過某個字在控制項文字中時執行的工作項目。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法方法來搜尋特定字串內控制項，並顯示找到的字串所在位置內的字元索引控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method with the method to search for a specific string within a control and display the character index where the found string is located within the control. 範例搜尋控制項的內容中的"brown"這個字，並傳回找到的搜尋字串的字元索引位置。The example searches for the word "brown" within the contents of the control and returns the character index position where the search string is found. 此範例中，您需要包含表單的表單控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，其中包含文字。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1` that contains text. 它也需要在此範例中的程式碼會連接到事件的。It also requires that the code in the example is connected to the event of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您判斷中指定的字元索引為基礎的行號`index`方法的參數。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控制項中文字的第一行會傳回值為零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法傳回的實體的行號索引的字元位於控制項。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果第一個邏輯程式敘述行中的文字部分控制項換行至下一行，方法會傳回 1，如果第二個實際的電話線已包裝的指定的字元索引處的字元。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果設為`false`、 沒有部分的行換行至下一步，而方法會傳回 0，指定的字元索引。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪些行特定的字元索引位於內。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在呼叫之後方法來搜尋文字，您可以取得字元索引，要找到搜尋結果。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以呼叫這個方法所傳回的字元索引與找不到方法，以判斷哪一行文字。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. 在某些情況下，不會擲回例外狀況時`index`參數是無效的值。In certain cases, does not throw an exception when the `index` parameter is an invalid value. 例如：For example: - 如果`index`參數是則為-1，會傳回 0。If the `index` parameter is or -1, returns 0. - 如果`index`參數是文字長度或，傳回的最後一行文字，不一定是相同的數字作為`Lines.Length-1`上的值，取決於屬性。If the `index` parameter is the text length or , returns the number of the last line of text, which is not necessarily the same as `Lines.Length-1`, depending on the value of the property. 在這些情況下，驗證的輸入，然後再呼叫。In these cases, validate the input before calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的字元索引`index`參數已超出可用的控制項中包含的程式行數目，會傳回最後一個行號。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含控制項，名為`RichTextBox1`，名為按鈕`Button1`和名為的兩個文字方塊`TextBox1`和`TextBox2`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control named `RichTextBox1`, a button named `Button1` and two text boxes named `TextBox1` and `TextBox2`. 執行範例時，輸入搜尋字串中的`TextBox2`按一下按鈕，讓搜尋結果。When the example is running, enter a search string in `TextBox2` and click the button to get search results. remarks.format: ## Remarks 載入的檔案時方法，載入檔案的內容取代的整個內容控制項。When loading a file with the method, the contents of the file being loaded replace the entire contents of the control. 這會導致值和屬性來變更。This will cause the values of the and properties to change. 您可以使用這個方法，將先前建立的文字或 RTF 文件載入操作的控制項。You can use this method to load a previously created text or RTF document into the control for manipulation. 如果您想要儲存檔案，您可以使用方法。If you want to save the file, you can use the method. > [!NOTE] > 使用此版本的方法，如果所載入的檔案不是 RTF 文件中，會發生例外狀況。With this version of the method, if the file being loaded is not an RTF document, an exception will occur. 若要載入不同類型的檔案，例如 ASCII 文字檔案，請使用 接受的值，這個方法的其他版本列舉型別做為參數。To load a different type of file such as an ASCII text file, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. > [!NOTE] > 方法不會開啟檔案，直到建立控制代碼。The method will not open a file until a handle is created for the . 確保呼叫之前，先建立控制項的控制代碼方法。Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟至 RTF 檔控制項。The following code example opens an RTF file into the control. 此範例會使用類別，以顯示對話方塊以向使用者要求的檔案。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the file from the user. 程式碼會接著載入該檔案假設它是 RTF 文件檔案。The code then loads that file assuming that it is an RTF document file. 如果檔案不是，範例程式碼會擲回例外狀況。If the file is not, the example code will throw an exception. 這個範例需要程式碼會置於類別具有控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 載入的檔案時方法，載入檔案的內容取代的整個內容控制項。When loading a file with the method, the contents of the file being loaded replace the entire contents of the control. 這會導致值和屬性來變更。This will cause the values of the and properties to change. 您可以使用這個方法，將先前建立的文字或 rich text format (RTF) 文件載入操作的控制項。You can use this method to load a previously created text or rich text format (RTF) document into the control for manipulation. 如果您想要儲存檔案，您可以使用方法。If you want to save the file, you can use the method. 您可以使用這個版本的方法，以指定所載入的檔案的檔案類型。You can use this version of the method to specify the file type of the file being loaded. 這項功能可讓您將 RTF 文件 以外的檔案載入控制項。This feature enables you to load files other than RTF documents into the control. > [!NOTE] > 方法不會開啟檔案，直到建立控制代碼。The method will not open a file until a handle is created for the . 確保呼叫之前，先建立控制項的控制代碼方法。Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟到文字檔控制項。The following code example opens a text file into the control. 此範例會使用類別，以顯示對話方塊以向使用者要求的檔案。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the file from the user. 程式碼接著會載入該檔案控制項。The code then loads that file into the control. 此範例會使用這個版本的方法，以指定 開啟檔案時，會為 ASCII 文字檔案，而非標準的 rtf 文字格式。The example uses this version of the method to specify that the file be opened as an ASCII text file instead of the standard rich text format. 這個範例需要程式碼會置於類別具有控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為 0 時，可以在控制項中輸入文字的最大長度是 64 KB 的字元。When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is 64 KB of characters. 這個屬性通常是使用用來顯示單行文字 rtf 格式 (RTF)。This property is typically used when the is used to display a single line of rich text format (RTF) text. 您可以使用這個屬性，來限制在控制項中輸入的值，例如郵遞區號和電話號碼的文字的長度，或限制輸入資料時要在資料庫中輸入文字的長度。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 您可以限制的文字輸入控制項，以在資料庫中的對應欄位的最大長度。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼中，您可以設定的值屬性設為大於所指定之值的長度值屬性。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 這個屬性只會影響文字輸入控制項，在執行階段。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷文字指派給控制項指派給的值大於屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if text being assigned to a control is larger than the value assigned to the property. 如果文字不是較大，此範例會使用將文字指派給控制項的屬性。If the text is not larger, the example uses the property to assign the text to the control. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已新增至表單，此範例中的方法呼叫提供給參數要貼上控制項的文字。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to a form and that the method in the example is called with text supplied to the parameter that is to be pasted into the control. 這個範例也需要限制文字項目屬性設定為值。The example also requires that the property has been set to a value to limit text entry into the . [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 以指定的剪貼簿格式貼上剪貼簿的內容。

span.span: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard in the specified Clipboard format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法將資料從剪貼簿貼入控制項。You can use this method to paste data from the clipboard into the control. 本版方法是從不同方法，因為它可讓您指定的剪貼簿格式貼上只有文字。This version of the method is different from the method as it enables you to paste only text in a specified Clipboard format. 您可以使用方法來判斷剪貼簿內的資料是否為指定的剪貼簿格式。You can use the method to determine whether the data within the Clipboard is in the specified Clipboard format. 您可以接著會呼叫這個版本的方法，以確保使用適當的資料格式已到貼上作業。You can then call this version of the method to ensure that the paste operation is made with the appropriate data format. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來貼上到點陣圖控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 開啟之後點陣圖檔案，此範例會使用方法，將點陣圖複製到 Windows 剪貼簿。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最後，範例會擷取的格式物件，並確認格式都可以貼到控制項，並使用貼上資料的方法。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, verifies that the format can be pasted into the control, and uses the method to paste the data. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Protected As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者嘗試修改控制項中保護的文字時。

span.span: Occurs when the user attempts to modify protected text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立此事件的事件處理常式，在您的應用程式，來決定當使用者嘗試修改已標示為受保護的控制項中的文字。You can create an event handler for this event in your applications to determine when the user has attempted to modify text that has been marked as protected in the control. 可以用事件處理常式，以通知文字的使用者正嘗試修改的使用者受保護，或顯示對話方塊，可讓使用者的文字進行適當的變更。The event handler can be used to notify the user that the text the user is attempting to modify is protected or to display a dialog box that enables the user to make appropriate changes to the text. 例如，如果受保護的區域是日期，您可以顯示對話方塊，可讓使用者選擇日期，然後可以套用至控制項的文字。For example, if the protected area is a date, you can display a dialog box that enables the user to choose a date which can then be applied to the text of the control. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#543](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#543)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#543](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#543)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以接著使用重新套用上次復原作業至控制項的方法。You can then use the method to reapply the last undo operation to the control. 方法可讓您判斷是否將使用者已復原的最後一個作業可以套用到控制項。The method enables you to determine whether the last operation the user has undone can be reapplied to the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用並屬性，而方法，來限制刪除的文字除外的任何動作的重做作業。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties, and the method, to restrict a redo operation to any action except the deletion of text. 此範例中，您需要包含表單的表單控制以及內的作業已執行並復原在此範例中的程式碼會在呼叫之前。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control and that an operation within the has been performed and undone before the code in this example is called. span.span: The default is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 小於或等於零的值是輸入到控制項，請看不見的邊界會置於控制項的左側的像素為單位指定數目的控制項。When a value greater than zero is entered into the control, a nonvisible margin is placed in the control at the specified number of pixels from the left side of the control. 超出此邊界輸入任何文字會放在控制項中文字的下一行。Any text that is entered that extends beyond this margin is placed on the next line of text in the control. 這個屬性會影響目前輸入控制項，以及任何其他的文字輸入控制項，此屬性設定之後的所有文字。This property affects all text currently entered into the control as well as any additional text entered into the control after the property is set. 您可以使用這個屬性來指定輸入的所有文字的最大線條寬度控制項。You can use this property to specify a maximum line width for all text entered into a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立放大文字，會自動選取的控制項文字中單字，word 按兩下，且具有控制項的用戶端區域右邊邊界時。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控制項具有較小的寬度，使用下列程式碼會建立其中每個字元的文字會顯示的那一行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直顯示的位置，文字的任何組件上按一下將選取的文字會垂直顯示的事實不論單字的所有字元。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此範例中，您需要包含表單的表單控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]

value.span: RTF 格式的控制項文字。

span.span: The text of the control in RTF format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，以將 RTF 格式化文字至控制項，顯示，或擷取控制項文字的指定 RTF 格式控制項的文字中所定義。You can use this property to place RTF formatted text into the control for display or to extract the text of the control with the specified RTF formatting defined in the text of the control. 您從另一個的 RTF 來源，例如 Microsoft Word 或 Windows WordPad 指派 RTF 文字至控制項時，通常使用這個屬性。This property is typically used when you are assigning RTF text from another RTF source, such as Microsoft Word or Windows WordPad, to the control. 如果您變更會保留在執行階段，但不含格式只有未經處理的文字的屬性。If you change the property at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. RTF 代碼，請參閱"rich text format (RTF) 規格，1.6 版"位於 MSDN library， http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For the RTF codes, see "rich text format (RTF) Specification, version 1.6" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您將控制項的整個內容儲存至可供其他程式，例如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows WordPad RTF 檔。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果檔案名稱傳遞給`path`參數已經存在於指定的目錄中，將會覆寫該檔案，而不另行通知。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 您可以使用方法，以將檔案內容載入。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . > [!NOTE] > 若要將控制項的內容儲存至不同類型的檔案格式，例如 ASCII 文字中，使用 接受的值，這個方法的其他版本列舉型別做為參數。To save the contents of the control to a different type of file format such as ASCII text, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將儲存的內容RTF 檔的控制項。The following code example saves the contents of a control to an RTF file. 此範例會使用類別，以顯示對話方塊以要求來自使用者的路徑和檔案的檔案名稱儲存。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request from the user, the path and filename of the file to save. 程式碼然後儲存檔案假設為 rtf 文字格式的內容。The code then saves the file assuming the content is in rich text format. 如果檔案已經存在，它會自動覆寫。If the file already exists, it is automatically overwritten. 這個範例需要程式碼會置於類別具有控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您將控制項的整個內容儲存至可供其他程式，例如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows WordPad RTF 檔。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果檔案名稱傳遞給`path`參數已經存在於指定的目錄中，將會覆寫該檔案，而不另行通知。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 您可以使用方法，以將檔案內容載入。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . 這個版本的方法可讓您指定的檔案類型，以儲存控制項的內容。This version of the method enables you to specify a file type to save the contents of the control to. 您可以使用這項功能，以確保檔案會儲存在適當的格式控制項的內容為基礎。You can use this feature to ensure that the file is saved in the proper format based on the contents of the control. 例如，如果您的文件不有任何差異字型樣式或著色，您可以將檔案儲存為 ASCII 文字檔案藉由設定`fileType`參數來`RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`。For example, if your document has no differences in font style or coloring, you can save the file as an ASCII text file by setting the `fileType` parameter to `RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將儲存的內容到 ASCII 文字檔。The following code example saves the contents of the into an ASCII text file. 此範例會使用類別，以顯示對話方塊以向使用者要求的路徑和檔案名稱。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the path and file name from the user. 然後，程式碼會將控制項的內容儲存至該檔案。The code then saves the contents of the control to that file. 此範例會使用這個版本的方法，以指定的檔案會儲存為 ASCII 文字檔案，而非標準的 rtf 文字格式。The example uses this version of the method to specify that the file be saved as an ASCII text file instead of the standard rich text format. 這個範例需要程式碼會置於類別具有控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有選取的段落控制項中，設定這個屬性適用於 [對齊] 設定中的插入點也會顯示具有 [對齊] 屬性設定的段落之後建立的段落。If no paragraph is selected in the control, setting this property applies the alignment setting to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears as well as to paragraphs created after the paragraph that has the alignment property setting. 例如，如果有兩個段落中的控制項及插入點位於第二段。For example, if there are two paragraphs in a control and the insertion point is located within the second paragraph. 如果您設定屬性設`HorizontalAlignment.Center`，在插入點的段落置中在控制項內。If you set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`, the paragraph at the insertion point will be centered within the control. 如果第三個段落建立第二個段落之後，它也會對齊控制項的中央。If a third paragraph is created after the second paragraph, it also is aligned to the center of the control. 如果選取範圍控制項中設定屬性時，所有選取的段落對齊根據此屬性設定。If a selection is made within the control when the property is set, all paragraphs selected are aligned based on this property setting. 您可以使用這個屬性來對齊所建立的文件中的段落。You can use this property to align the paragraphs in a document being created in the . 例如，如果您想要置中的文件中的所有段落時，您可以選取控制項中的所有段落和設定屬性設`HorizontalAlignment.Center`。For example, if you want all paragraphs in a document to be centered, you can select all the paragraphs in the control and set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`. > [!NOTE] > 傳回`SelectionAlignment.Left`當文字選取範圍包含多個段落與混合的對齊方式。 returns `SelectionAlignment.Left` when the text selection contains multiple paragraphs with mixed alignment. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將內的文字對齊。The following code example demonstrates how to align text within the . 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已新增至表單。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未不選取任何文字，則項目符號樣式會套用至目前插入點和使用者輸入的插入點之後的所有段落。If no text is selected, the bullet style is applied to the current insertion point and to all paragraphs that the user enters after the insertion point. 項目符號樣式被套用至控制項的文字中，直到移動插入點，或當使用者按下 Enter 鍵，空的項目符號項目上。The bullet style is applied to the text of the control until the insertion point is moved or when the user presses the Enter key on an empty bullet item. 如果控制項內選取的文字，當設定這個屬性時，所選的文字內的所有段落會都轉換成項目符號清單中的項目符號項目中。If text is selected within the control when this property is set, all paragraphs within the selected text are converted into bulleted items in the bulleted list. 您可以使用這個屬性來建立您在文件內的項目符號清單控制項。You can use this property to create bulleted lists within the documents you create in the control. 屬性可讓您指定要套用的項目符號與項目符號的文字之間的縮排的量。The property enables you to specify the amount of indentation to apply between the bullet and the bulleted item's text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用具有屬性， ，和來建立項目符號清單中的屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`會在表單上建立。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立此事件，以判斷當使用者變更控制項中的文字選取範圍的事件處理常式。You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the user has changed text selection within the control. 此事件的事件處理常式可用來保留使用者已完成應用程式中的工作完成，才選取的文字。An event handler for this event can be used to keep text selected until the user has completed a task within the application. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 取得或設定控制項中的文字是否出現於基礎上做為上標，或者出現於基礎下方做為下標。

span.span: Gets or sets whether text in the control appears on the baseline, as a superscript, or as a subscript below the baseline.

value.span: 指定字元位移 (Offset) 的數字。

span.span: A number that specifies the character offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值必須是介於-2000年和 2000年之間。The value of this property must be between -2000 and 2000. 如果這個屬性設定為零，文字會出現在基準中。If this property is set to zero, the text appears on the baseline. 如果是正數，則數字會指定像素乘冪數高於基準的文字選取項目數目。If it is a positive number, the number specifies the number of pixels by which to raise the text selection above the baseline. 如果是負數，則這個數字會指定所依據的像素數註標文字選取範圍。If it is a negative number, this number specifies the number of pixels by which to subscript the text selection. 您可以使用這個屬性指定為上標或下標的文字。You can use this property to specify text as superscript or subscript. 如果未不選取任何文字，則位移會套用至目前插入點和使用者類型的插入點之後的所有文字。If no text is selected, the offset is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that the user types after the insertion point. 直到屬性變更為不同的值，或者將插入點移至控制項中的不同區段之前，適用於字元位移。The character offset applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果選取的文字控制項中，選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍會有套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性來建立這類應用程式做為數學運算式上標和下標的文字。You can use this property to create superscript and subscript text for such applications as mathematical expressions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定上標和下標的文字內使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify superscript and subscript text within the using the property. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已新增至表單。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前文字選取範圍會有多個指定的色彩，則這個屬性會傳回`Color.Empty`。If the current text selection has more than one color specified, this property returns `Color.Empty`. 如果目前不選取任何文字，此屬性中指定的文字色彩會套用至目前插入點，並在插入點後輸入控制項的所有文字。If no text is currently selected, the text color specified in this property is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 文字色彩的設定會套用直到屬性變更為不同的色彩，或插入點移至控制項中的不同區段為止。The text color setting applies until the property is changed to a different color or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果選取的文字控制項中，選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍會有套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性，若要變更的文字色彩。You can use this property to change the color of text in the . 若要使控制項中的粗體文字，請使用將具有指定的粗體字型樣式的新字型的屬性。To make text bold in the control, use the property to assign a new font that has the bold font style specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示給使用者，以指定的目前文字選取範圍或目前的插入動作之後輸入的文字色彩點控制項。The following code example displays a to the user to specify a color for the current text selection or text entered after the current insertion point in a control. 這個範例需要在此範例中定義的方法會加入至類別，其中包含控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the method defined in the example is added to a class that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前不選取任何文字，出現的插入點的段落，並在插入點後輸入控制項的所有文字，會套用的首行縮排。If no text is currently selected, the hanging indent is applied to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 首行縮排設定會套用直到屬性變更為不同的值，或者將插入點移至控制項內的不同段落之前。The hanging indent setting applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different paragraph within the control. 如果選取的文字控制項中，選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍會有套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性用於您段落首行縮排。You can use this property to apply a hanging indent to your paragraphs. 若要設定的段落選取範圍的第一行縮排，請使用屬性。To set the indention of the first line of a paragraph selection, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定內首行縮排使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify hanging indents within the using the property. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已新增至表單。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷是否任何字元目前選取的文字方塊控制項中選取的文字上執行作業之前。You can use this property to determine if any characters are currently selected in the text box control before performing operations on the selected text. 您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷總數 （包括空格） 的字元，執行單一字元中工作時，未選取`for`迴圈。You can also use this property to determine the total number of characters (including spaces) that are selected when performing single character tasks in a `for` loop. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否中選取文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if text is selected within the . 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已新增至表單。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. 這個範例也需要`richTextBox1`包含在控制項中選取的文字。The example also requires that `richTextBox1` contains text that is selected in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前不選取任何文字，出現的插入點的段落，並在插入點後輸入控制項的所有文字，會套用的保護設定。If no text is currently selected, the protection setting is applied to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 保護設定會套用直到屬性變更為不同的值，或者將插入點移至控制項內的不同段落之前。The protection setting applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different paragraph within the control. 如果選取的文字控制項中，選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍會有套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性，以防止使用者修改控制項中的文字區段。You can use this property to prevent the user from modifying sections of text within the control. 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，則當使用者嘗試變更目前文字選取範圍時，會引發事件。If this property is set to `true`, the event is raised when the user attempts to change the current text selection. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會傳回`true`只有在控制項內整個選取範圍包含受保護的內容。This property will return `true` only if the entire selection within the control contains protected content. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定受保護的文字內使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify protected text within the using the property. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已新增至表單，控制項已加入至它的文字，其中包含單字"RichTextBox"。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form and that the control has text added to it that contains the word "RichTextBox." remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，讓使用者輕鬆選取中的文字行。You can use this property to enable the user to easily select lines of text in the . 選取範圍邊界會新增至左邊。The selection margin is added to the left side of the . 此邊界更容易讓使用者選取控制項的左邊開始的文字。This margin makes it easier for the user to select text starting on the left side of the control. 使用者可以按一下以選取 單行文字選取範圍邊界，或按兩下以選取整個段落某一行內所包含。The user can click in the selection margin to select a single line of text or double-click to select the entire paragraph that the line double-clicked is contained within. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`true`，將屬性設`RichTextBoxScrollBars.Horizontal`， `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Vertical`，或`RichTextBoxScrollBars.Both`並不會造成要顯示的捲軸。If the property is set to `true`, setting the property to `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Horizontal`, `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Vertical`, or `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Both` will not cause scroll bars to be displayed. 若要顯示捲軸時屬性設定為`true`，將屬性設`RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedHorizontal`， `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedVertical`，或`RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedBoth`。In order to display scroll bars while the property is set to `true`, set the property to `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedHorizontal`, `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedVertical`, or `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedBoth`.

summary.span: 取得或設定 的目前縮放層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level of the .

value.span: 縮放控制項內容的因數。

span.span: The factor by which the contents of the control is zoomed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值可以是 1/64 (0.015625) 和 64.0 之間，不含之間。The value of this property can be between 1/64 (0.015625) and 64.0, not inclusive. 1.0 的值會指出不縮放套用至控制項。A value of 1.0 indicates that no zoom is applied to the control. 當文件包含 TrueType 字型時，會以最佳方式執行縮放功能。The zoom feature performs optimally when the document contains TrueType fonts. 當控制項的文件中使用不是 TrueType 字型屬性將會使用最接近的整數值。When a font that is not TrueType is used within the document of the control, the property will use the nearest whole number value. 您可以使用這個屬性，讓使用者的控制項來放大太小，若要檢視或壓縮的檢視，以啟用多個要在螢幕上檢視的文件的文件區段。You can use this property to enable the user of the control to zoom into sections of the documentation that are too small to view or to condense the view to enable more of the document to be viewed on screen. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立放大文字，會自動選取的控制項文字中單字，word 按兩下，且具有控制項的用戶端區域右邊邊界時。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控制項具有較小的寬度，使用下列程式碼會建立其中每個字元的文字會顯示的那一行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直顯示的位置，文字的任何組件上按一下將選取的文字會垂直顯示的事實不論單字的所有字元。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此範例中，您需要包含表單的表單控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]
